componentInstanceProperties.name: IntroText
componentInstanceProperties.value: Disrupting the Wine Industry, One Glass at a Time

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Invest in a disruptive wine platform that sells sommelier-curated wines from independent winemakers by the glass, in sustainable packaging.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Key Investor Highlights

  • Customer-centric wine solution with proven traction.
  • Forecasting $21.6m revenue within 5 years.
  • Funding to meet rapid growth across B2C, B2B & Export markets; 3 tonnes of wine shipped to Dubai in Nov 2023.
  • Next routes to market; Quick Service Restaurants (QSR), Airlines, Food delivery, Meal prep, Short Stay Accommodation, Events, Gifting & Subscription.

A Glass of® was created to fill a need that the wine industry wasn’t meeting, to cater for consumers who wanted to enjoy a glass of good wine without always having to open a bottle.

Unencumbered by industry conventions and using a customer-centric approach, the founders disrupted the wine category with beautifully-branded curated wines from premium Australian winemakers, in glass-size (well, slightly more generous than a glass), environmentally-friendly pouches.

Their products capitalise on a convergence of five emerging trends:

  • Wellness: a focus on improving health and wellbeing through portion control. Drink less, but better.
  • Sustainability: the pouches require less materials and less energy to make than glass, cans or plastic bottles.
  • Authenticity: the rise in craft beverages, wanting to know the provenance of products, and supporting local, independent winemakers.
  • Convenience: single serve and portable.
  • Celebrity: the cult of the sommelier.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Even better, A Glass of®’s approach has been a win for the industry as well with more exposure for independent winemakers after Covid, bushfires and tariffs have wreaked havoc on the industry and down-the-line brand loyalty from consumers.

With strong growth in revenue and new channels to market being opened up in ANZ and EMEA and B2C sales in Australia, the company is now ready to further build its business and scale.

A Glass of® is currently raising up to $1.25 million seed equity round and is inviting VentureCrowd investors to close this round out with a $500,000 allocation (with the board reserving the right to take oversubscriptions).

Sources: Statistica and Fortune Business Insights

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
firstImgFooterText
componentInstanceProperties.value: With 3 primary markets: Direct to consumer, domestic wholesale and expert, A Glass of<sup>®</sup> forecasts revenue (incl postage) of $650K in FY24 increasing to 7.65 million in FY26 and becoming profitable, at 55% gross margin.

componentInstanceProperties.name: secondImgFooterText
componentInstanceProperties.value: Founder and CEO, Paul Taylor, has over 25 years of experience in brand development and is a former Creative Director/Partner at M&C SAATCHI. He has a highly experienced team including former beverage industry executive Peter Sinclair, and industry-leading Sommelier-in-Residence Gabrielle Webster. Former Virgin Money CEO David Wakeley is also involved as an advisor.

componentInstanceProperties.name: thirdImgFooterText
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Australian wine market revenue was approx. US$8.5 billion in 2023 at a CAGR of 4.42% (2023-2028).*
The global wine market is projected to grow from $340.23 billion in 2021 to $456.76 billion in 2028 at a CAGR of 4.30% (2021-2028).**

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The Offer

A Glass of® is offering investors up to 15,410 shares in the company at approx. $48.67 per share.

Open to wholesale and pre-approved investors, VentureCrowd has been allocated $500,000 to close out this Seed round (with the board reserving the right to take oversubscriptions), and you can invest from $5000.

Register now to get early access to the live deal.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Don't miss out! There's a limited allocation for this wholesale offering.

Questions? Read our Frequently Asked Questions, Investor Hub or reach out to CEO/Founder Paul Taylor: paul@aglassof.com

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Growth Outlook

The company's growth focus is to drive export sales, secure domestic wholesale trade partnerships, and expand the direct-to-customer offering.

In FY26 it is expected that the export business and the domestic B2B business will each contribute 47% of revenue, with the consumer business contributing the balance (6%).

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
High-end Customers

Hyatt Regency, Marriott Hotels, FIVE Palm Jumeirah in Dubai through distribution partner African & Eastern, plus Unyoked, Shorty's Liquor (part of Endeavour Group) and leading boutique hotels Crystalbrook Group of Hotels, Ace Hotel, Hyatt Centric, The Bower Bryon Bay, AC Marriott, The Brunswick, The Constance, Lancemore Werribee Park Mansion.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Traction & Growth to Date

Domestic B2B
Selling to high-end hotels, signing up new elite boutique hotels, with increasing frequency and volume. Expanding into quick service restaurants (eg, Banana Blossom), gift hampers and office-delivered alcohol, and investigating retail partnerships. Further expansion opportunities exist with airlines, airport lounges, short-stay accommodation, pre-prep delivery meal operators, home delivery food operators and dark kitchens, as well as event organisers such as music and film festivals.

International Export B2E
First order already shipped to Dubai hotels, with the 2nd order coming. Expansion into Singapore & HK markets is also underway.

Domestic B2C
Previous Sommelier Ranges have sold out (75,000 pouches), 62% repurchase rate and increasing AOV.

componentInstanceProperties.value:
Raise a Glass to Wine Industry Innovation
